original_title: When the White House Comes to Zion
overview: Take an entertaining journey through time as you discover the stories behind the events that brought American presidents to the Zion of the West. You'll be delighted with fascinating stories and anecdotes about American presidents' memorable visits from the time of the presidential Pullman railroad car to today's Air Force One.  With hundreds of historical photographs and film clips, some never before published, this visual history highlights the warmth and hospitality of the people of the Beehive State. You may even find a photo of your grandfather, cousin, mother, or father in a crowd surrounding John F. Kennedy, Ronald Regan, or George W. Bush.
tagline: From the Oval Office to Temple Square
title: When the White House Comes to Zion
